Case# MPSCNNNeuronType.reLUN

iOS 11.0+iPadOS 11.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.13+tvOS 11.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
case reLUN
```

## [See Also](/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSCNNNeuronType/reLUN#see-also)

### [Enumeration Cases](/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSCNNNeuronType/reLUN#Enumeration-Cases)

[`case none`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnneurontype/none)A neuron type indicating no neuron filter.[`case reLU`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnneurontype/relu)A neuron type indicating a rectified linear unit neuron filter.[`case linear`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnneurontype/linear)A neuron type indicating a linear neuron filter.[`case sigmoid`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnneurontype/sigmoid)A neuron type indicating a sigmoid neuron filter.[`case hardSigmoid`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnneurontype/hardsigmoid)A neuron type indicating a hard sigmoid neuron filter.[`case tanH`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnneurontype/tanh)A neuron type indicating a hyperbolic tangent neuron filter.[`case absolute`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnneurontype/absolute)A neuron type indicating an absolute neuron filter.[`case softPlus`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnneurontype/softplus)A neuron type indicating a parametric softplus neuron filter.[`case softSign`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnneurontype/softsign)A neuron type indicating a softsign neuron filter.[`case ELU`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnneurontype/elu)A neuron type indicating a parametric exponential linear unit neuron filter.[`case count`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnneurontype/count)[`case exponential`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnneurontype/exponential)[`case geLU`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnneurontype/gelu)[`case logarithm`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnneurontype/logarithm)[`case pReLU`](/documentation/metalperformanceshaders/mpscnnneurontype/prelu)
